org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.engine.compiler

Class Compiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.engine.compiler.Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Compiler functionality that maps the EventPatterns, combined via complex event operators to the internal representation language of the engine. That is, for every EventPattern, an Automaton is created.
    Author:
    Istvan David

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public Automaton compile(EventPattern eventPattern)
        The entry point of compiling a single EventPattern. Based on its type, the specific mapping methods are invoked.
        Parameters:
        eventPattern - the EventPattern to be compiled into an Automaton
        Returns:
        the Automaton created from the EventPattern
